title: PARTLY FALSE: Power outage over 'entire Laguna'
subtitle: Ashfall affects electricity only in some areas of Batangas, Cavite, and Laguna, and Meralco is already working to restore power in these places
author: rappler.com
vclaim:
Claim: A message being shared on messaging apps warns people to charge their devices because of a supposed blackout that hit the entirety of Laguna.

The facts: While ashfall did affect electricity in Batangas, Cavite, and Laguna, not all areas in these provinces were affected.

According the Department of the Interior and Local Government in Region (DILG) IV-A Disaster Risk Reduction team, there were power interruptions in Calamba and Cabuyao, Laguna, but power was restored on the night of January 13.

In a statement, Meralco said it is already working to restore power in the areas that experienced interruptions and outages.

Some portions of Sta Rosa, Cabuyao, and Calamba already had their electricity restored in the morning of January 13, they said.

The claim spread amid an imminent eruption from Taal Volcano, which spewed lava and ash earlier in the day. – Rappler.com
